As seen in the photo, Eneng is the one who is sitting in her own small stall. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide enhanced mobile payment services to her community

loans.name: Uulkan

texts.ru: Уулкан, 42 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Уулкан высшее образование, работает в школе, также в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она вместе с супругом занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Уулкан, ее хозяйство на сегодняшний день насчитывает 6 коров, 35 овец. Бизнес в целом приносит до 25,000 сом (KGS)в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Уулкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Уулкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а в ближайшем будущем отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Uulkan is 42 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a college education and works in a school.  As an additional source of income for the family, she and her husband are also involved in animal husbandry.  Thanks to her very hard work, Uulkan now has six cows and 35 sheep on her farm.  Her business brings a total of up to 25,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to further grow her business, Uulkan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to increase her cattle headcount.  She plans to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her number of domestic animals and, in the near future, to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock to expand her business.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta es una madre de familia que tiene 2 hijos de las edades entre 3 y 6 años de edad, ella es casada vive en una comunidad de Sololá
Marta es una mujer dedicada al trabajo pues ella para poder ayudar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa y mantener a la familia, se dedica a la venta de ropa típica desde su propia casa, esta actividad para ella es bastante beneficiosa porque le permite a Marta convivir más tiempo con sus hijos, Marta es  una señora que se preocupa por las necesidades de la familia y una de las  más prioritarias es la construcción de un muro, pero Marta no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para empezar a construir el muro que beneficiara a la seguridad de la casa, por tal motivo ella está solicitando un préstamo de Q 4,000.00 con el que comprara cemento, cal, arena y piedras.
El gran sueño de Marta es poder contar con este crédito para brindarle más seguridad a la familia y que algún día ella pueda construir la propia casa de su hijo.
texts.en:
Marta is married and has 2 children who are 3 and 6 years old.  She lives in the community of Sololá.  She is a mother who is dedicated to her work so that she can help her husband with the household income and support the family.  She makes a living selling traditional clothing from her home, and this business is convenient enough for her because it allows her to spend more time with her children.  

Marta is a woman who cares about fulfilling her family's necessities and one of her biggest priorities is the construction of a wall that will add to the security of her home.  However, she doesn't have enough money to start building the wall, so she is applying for a loan of 4,000.00 Q that she will use to buy cement, lime, sand, and stones.  Marta's big dream is to be able to use this loan to provide her family with more security and she hopes that one day she can build a home for her son.

loans.use: to buy cement, lime, sand, and stones for the construction of a wall

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru: Халима, 53 года, замужем, есть 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, на протяжении 19 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, Халима на сегодняшний день имеет 4 коровы, 20 овец. Также на земельном наделе мерою 3,0 Га, она выращивает фасоль для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Халима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 дойных коров для реализации экологически чистого молока. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность улучшить условия проживания ее семьи.
texts.en: Halima is 53 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture for the past 19 years.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has four cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  She also grows beans for resale on three hectares of land.  In order to further grow her business, Halima has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy three dairy cows to sell more organic milk.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her business, so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase three dairy cows in order to produce and sell larger volumes of organic milk.

loans.name: Chamroeun

texts.en: Chamroeun is a 36 year-old married factory worker with three dependent children. She is from the province of Takeo, Cambodia. She has been a factory worker since 2012. Her husband is a 33 year-old construction worker and all her three children attend school. Chamroeun and her husband can make around $11 per day. She has decided to take out a loan because she needs money to buy a cow to fatten and breed for calves to sell and also for plowing. This loan will help her have enough money to buy a cow. For her future plans, she is going to build a new proper house and help all the children to earn bachelor degrees. She also hopes that her husband will become a construction foreman.

loans.use: to buy a cow to fatten and breed for calves to sell and also for plowing

loans.name: Natividad Olimpia

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Los Jardines. 
En este lugar vive la señora Natividad, tiene 58 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 8  hijos mayores  de edad, cuatro de aun viven con ella. El marido maestro. 
Doña Natividad es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogos y productos de Avon y Belcorp (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa cuando sus clientes quieren algo,  ella sale a recorrer casi  todos los días en sus ratos libres ya que no tiene horario fijo, deja sus productos a  crédito y cobra cada ocho o quince días. Lleva más de 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le permite ganar algo por su cuenta para beneficio de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa. Lleva desde el inicio  en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y su vida familiar.
texts.en:
The members of the Los Jardines Communal Bank meet every 15 days in the citadel of Nueva California in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí and known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind Trees.  

Here we find Natividad, 58 years old, who is in a common-law marriage and has 8 adult children, 4 of whom still live with her.  Her husband is a teacher.   
Natividad is a housewife who makes a living selling catalog clothing and Avon and Belcorp products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and accessories for women), in order to bring in her own income and help her husband with the household expenses.  She carries out her sales on a fixed schedule, allowing her customers to take products on credit and collecting her pay every 8 or 15 days.  She has been doing this business for over 8 years, and it allows her to bring in some income on her own for the benefit of her family.  

This loan will go towards buying perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothing.  She has been a member of this communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans allow her to finance her business.  Her dream is to continue moving forwards with her business and her family life.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothing

loans.name: Yahaira Elisa

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Los Jardines. 
En este lugar vive la señora Yahaira, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 13 y 5 años, el mayor estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es Ing. civil.
Doña Yahaira es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos por catalogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja tres o cuatro días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, ella también tiene un carro en el cual realiza transporte escolar con el cual se gana lo suyo por su labor, allí también ella una vez que deja a los alumnos realiza sus ventas. Lleva más de 13 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos por catalogo ya que tiene varias entregas que realizar y para realizar arreglos en el bus transporte. Lleva más de 13 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un carro nuevo para realizar sus recorridos.
texts.en:
In the Nueva California citadel of the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí long known as "the City of the Royal Tamarinds", the members of the "Los Jardines" communal bank meet every fortnight.

Yahaira lives in this place. She is 34 years old, married and from this relationship has two children aged 13 and 5 years old. The oldest studies in secondary school, the youngest in primary school. Her husband is a civil engineer.

Yahaira is a housewife who in order to obtain her own resources and help her husband with the household expense, works at selling clothing and footwear from catalogs. she sells door-to-door. she works 3 or 4 days per week and two to three hours per day. She leaves her product on credit and collects every 8 days. She also has a vehicle which she uses for school transportation which she makes money from her labor. Once she drops off her students she makes her sales.

She has been doing this for 13 years and things are going well for her. This loan is to buy clothing and shoes by catalog and to make repairs on the bus. She has been in the communal bank for 13 years and she likes it as she started her business through the loans. Her dream is to have a new car to make her rounds.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes and have repairs done on the bus.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene is 20 years old and has three children. Mylene is single woman.

Mylene is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Mylene requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies for raising her pigs.

Mylene has been in this business for 3 years and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mylene would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: buy feed and other supplies for raising her pigs

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is a 36 year-old married woman with four children, all of which are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Marietta has a fishing business in the Philippines. Marietta requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net and other supplies to use for her fishing business.

Marietta has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, Marietta would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish net and other supplies to use for her fishing business

loans.name: Ayo

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for us to introduce you to one of Ruma agents, Ayo. Ayo lives with his wife in Sukabumi, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede in West Java, about 80 km (50 mi) south of the national capital, Jakarta. Together, they have a 6 year-old son who is going to elementary school. They began to realize that they needed to save money for their child’s education. 

Ayo runs a stall where he sells small snacks and drinks. 2 years ago, Ayo was introduced to Ruma and became interested in joining . Now, Ayo is a Ruma agent who provides mobile services to his communities, by selling mobile phone airtime right from his cell phone. Ayo feels glad because the business he runs has a social impact on his communities.

Ayo hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide more of these mobile services to communities. In the near future, he plans to expand his business by selling Ruma’s catalog products to his current customers.  Ayo will be thankful for your full support.

loans.use: to provide enhanced mobile payment services for his community

loans.name: Nofita

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Nofita. Nofita lives in East Bandung, a city located about three hour’s drive from Jakarta. She lives there with her husband and her son. She owns a small stall where she daily sells consumer products and provides mobile payment services for her community. Nofita is a cheerful and hardworking woman and her customers see her as a trusted mobile provider.

Nofita joined Ruma a year ago. She learned of Ruma from a Ruma sales executive who came to her stall. She decided to join Ruma because she wants to learn to expand her business. With support from Ruma’s staff, Nofita sees some improvements in her business. As the business grows Nofita is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide enhanced mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. A Kiva loan will be very useful to help Nofita improve her business and accordingly, her community, which needs access to such services.

As seen in the photo, Nofita is the one who is smiling and standing in her own small stall. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide enhanced mobile payment services for her community

loans.name: Shaiyrbubu

texts.ru: Шайырбубу 52 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. Шайырбубу в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством. Начав свою деятельность в 1982 году, на сегодня в хозяйстве есть 1 дойная корова, лошадь, 20 овец. Также на земельном участке, мерою 2,0 Га она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Ежедневно Шайырбубу продает молоко. Она полна сил и энергии развивать свой бизнес и заниматься любимым делом, так как нужно помогать своим детям и внукам. Сегодня ежемесячная прибыль Шайырбубу составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров для реализации экологически чистого и очень вкусного молока. Доходы от кредита Шайырбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Shaiyrbubu is 52 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income.  She started her activity in 1982 and currently has one dairy cow, one horse and 20 sheep on her farm.  She also grows beans for resale on two hectares of land.  She sells milk on a daily basis.  

Shaiyrbubu is a strong woman and she has plenty of energy to develop her activity and to run a business which she loves and which allows her to help her children and grandchildren.  She currently makes a monthly income of 8,000 som (KGS).  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy two dairy cows to sell some delicious organic milk.  Shaiyrbubu is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her business.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to produce and sell larger volumes of organic milk.

loans.name: Asep

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Asep. Asep lives in Cianjur, located about three hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall where he sells mobile phone credits and provides mobile payment services for his community. Asep has been a member of Ruma for a year. He learned of Ruma from the sales executive, who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his business, as well as contributing more to his community.

As his business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide enhanced mobile payment services for his community. Your loan will be very useful to help Asep improve his business and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Asep  is the one who is sitting. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide enhanced mobile payment services to his community

loans.name: Sigit

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Sigit. Sigit lives in Tasikmalaya, located about five hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall where he sells mobile phone accessories and provides mobile payment services for his community.

Sigit joined Ruma in 2014. He learned of Ruma from one of the sales executives who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his business, as well as increase his savings and contribute more to his community. With the assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Sigit sees an improvement in his business. As the business grows he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide enhanced mobile payment services for his community. Securing a Kiva loan will be very useful to help Sigit improve his business and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Sigit is the one who is standing in his own small stall. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide enhanced mobile payment services for his community

loans.name: Zoila Esperanza

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Los Jardines. 
En este lugar vive la señora Zoila, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos  de 14 y 9 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Zoila junto al esposo tienen un local en el centro de la ciudad en el cual venden todo tipo de accesorios para carros, allí sus clientes pueden encontrar luces led, parlantes, radios, amplificadores y una gran variedad de otros accesorios que las personas utilizan para arreglar sus carros, ellos trabajan todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 19h00 que cierran su local, llevan más de  12 años en este negocio razón por lo cual su clientela es abundante y los prefiere ya que allí ellos encuentran de todo lo que necesitan. 
Este crédito es para comprar parlantes, luces, radios y todo de lo que ellos venden en su local. Lleva más de 9 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y a bajo interés. Sus sueños son tener otro local.
texts.en:
The members of Los Jardines Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the community of Nueva California in the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the City of the Royal Tamarinds.

Zoila, 39, lives here.  She's married and has two children, 14 and 9, who are students.  Her husband's a merchant.

Zoila and her husband have a retail space in the center of town where they sell all types of car accessories.  Their customers can find LED lights, speakers, radios, amplifiers, and a wide variety of other accessories people use to fix up their cars.  They work every day from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m., when they close the store. They have had this business for more than 12 years, so they have a lot of customers who prefer them because they find everything they need there.

This loan is to buy speakers, lights, radios, and everything they sell in their store.

She has been in the communal bank for more than nine years and she likes it because the loans are quick and the interest is low.  Her dream is to have another retail space.

loans.use: to buy speakers, lights, radios, etc.

loans.name: Lilis

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the new Ruma agents, Lilis. Lilis lives in Garut, a city located about four hours drive from Jakarta. She lives there with her husband and her two month old son. Lilis is a housewife. She is known by her neighbors as a cheerful and kind woman - that’s why it’s really easy for her to attract customers. As a woman, she began to realize that she needs to help her husband to improve their life by increasing their income. Now, Lilis is providing the services that allow her customers to buy mobile phone credits and pay their bills.

Lilis joined Ruma last month. She knew Ruma from a Ruma sales executive who came to her house. As the business grows, Lilis is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Lilis improve her business and accordingly, her community who needs access to such services.

As seen in the photo, Lilis is the one who is holding Ruma’s banner. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for her community.

loans.name: Kulzhamish

texts.ru: Кульжамиш 62 года, замужем, есть сын. Кульжамиш на пенсии, в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи на протяжении 15 лет занимается разведением скота и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний день Кульжамиш имеет в хозяйстве 2 коровы, 20 овец. На земельном участке выращивает фасоль. Вся деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме до 6,000 сом (KGS). Сделав вывод, что данный бизнес рентабелен, Кульжамиш обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец. Доходы от кредита Кульжамиш планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Kulzhamish is 62 years old, married, and she has one son.  She is retired. For the past 15 years, she has been raising livestock and growing crops, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has two cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  She also grows beans on a small plot of land.  Her entire activity brings her a monthly income of up to 6,000 som (KGS).  Knowing that her current activity can be profitable, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy ten additional sheep.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her farming business.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Hector Alonso

texts.es:
Este trabajador, arrogante, luchador, honesto hombre llamado Héctor es un agricultor que desde que el sol toca las montañas sale a trabajar en sus cultivos tal y como lo podemos observar en la foto.
Hablando un poco de la vida personal de Héctor es un hombre de 52 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo de 22 años de edad el cual el ayuda y en el deposita su confianza para que continúe la tradición familiar que una vez inicio su abuelo.
Algo que tiene muy decaída la agricultura es el bajo precio de venta de estos productos, mientras que ellos tienen que pagar enormes cantidades de dinero solo en insumos para poder que sus productos crezcan sanos y salvos.
Un ejemplo claro se encuentra en la solicitud de crédito que se encuentra realizando Héctor la  cual invertirá en  su totalidad en insumos agrícolas los cuales son gallinaza, fungicidas, e insecticidas.
Con tu apoyo este hombre de la zona rural podrá proteger sus cultivos de sus depredadores naturales y con un poco más tiempo esperar una gran cosecha.
Préstamo re publicado
texts.en:
This hard-working, honest, proud fighter named Héctor is a farmer who goes out to work in the fields as soon as a sun touches the mountains, as you can see from the photo.  To tell you a little bit about his personal life, he is a 52-year-old married man with a 22-year-old son who he helps and places his confidence in to continue on with the family tradition that his grandfather started.  

Something that has gotten him down on agriculture is the low selling price of his crops, while farmers have to pay enormous sums of money just for inputs so that their produce grows healthy and safe.  A clear example of this can be seen in the fact that Héctor finds himself applying for a loan, which he will invest entirely in agricultural inputs such as hen droppings, fungicide, and insecticide.  

With your support, this man from the countryside will be able to protect his crops from their natural predators and in time reap a great harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as hen droppings, fungicide, and insecticide

loans.name: Gilberto Alonso

texts.es:
Gilberto es un joven de 22 años de edad, muy trabajador, creativo, emprendedor,  monto por gusto y vocación al trabajo independiente un negocio de comidas rápidas, tiene su propio local, el mismo lo pinto, con ahorros logro comprar la maquinaria y sigue en pie de progreso con buenas ideas para impulsar su negocio que no ha podido materializar por falta de capital.
Los objetivos del año 2015 que se ha trazado Gilberto es generar empleo y expandir su negocio, el paro sus estudios por implementar y consolidar su negocio pero espera a tener un punto de equilibrio y retomarlos pues tiene grandes sueños de grandeza que quiere lograr con trabajo y humildad.
Gilberto en el momento se encuentra solicitando un monto que quiere usar en la compra de una freidora como la que podemos ver en la foto, comprar surtido de papas, chorizos de coctel, huevo de codorniz, y pollo que en el momento son los productos que oferta.
Apoya este joven que con ideas y trabajo quiere sacar su vida, su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a young 22-year-old man who is very hard-working, creative, and entrepreneurial.  He set up a fast food business out of his own desire and need for an independent profession.  He has his own location that he painted himself, and he was able to buy the machinery with his savings. He continues making progress with good ideas to push his business forward, but he has not been able to make them a reality because of a lack of capital.  

His goals for the year 2015 are to generate employment and expand his business.  He put his studies on hold to carry out and consolidate his business, but he hopes to reach an equilibrium point and start them up again, since he has dreams of greatness that he wants to achieve through work and humility.  Presently, Gilberto finds himself applying for funds to buy a fryer (like the one seen in the photo), and supplies of potatoes, cocktail sausages, quail eggs, and chicken, which are the products that he offers at the moment.

Please support this young man who wants to move his life and his family forwards through his ideas and his work.

loans.use: to buy a frier, supplies of potatoes, sausages, chorizo, and chicken, and containers to serve his products

loans.name: Gilar

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of the new Ruma agents, Gilar. Gilar lives in East Bandung, located about a three-hour drive from Jakarta. He lives there with his wife and his four children. He owns a small stall where he sells daily consumer products and provides mobile payment services for his community. Gilar just joined Ruma three months ago. He knew of Ruma from the sales executive who comes to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wanted to expand his business, as well as contribute more to his community.

As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services to his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Gilar improve his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Gilar is the one who is sitting in his own stall. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide mobile payment services to his community

loans.name: Hernan Dario

texts.es:
Hernán es un joven de 21 años de edad que se está adentrando en el mundo del emprendimiento, una nueva etapa para él pues siempre ha trabajado bajo la batuta de sus padres, es un hombre muy independiente, vive al lado de su pareja y su idea es mantenerse y en un futuro no muy lejano con mucho esfuerzo comprar una vivienda propia para vivir tranquilamente.
Hernán es un productor agropecuario junto a él se encuentra una fiel amiga su vaca que le ha dado el sustento.
Al ser tan joven todavía le queda mucho por aprender pero como a todos los productores se les está surgiendo una piedra en el zapato la cual es el bajo precio de venta de la leche. 
Hernán en el momento solo trabaja y sigue fiel a su profesión, él quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar una vaca en gestación, ella tiene un precio elevado igual al precio que está pidiendo, se compromete a pagar puntualmente ya que si lo apoyan le están dando la oportunidad de crecer.
texts.en:
Hernán is a young man of 21 who is getting into the world of entrepreneurship, a new stage for him since he has always worked under the direction of his parents. He is a very independent man. He lives with his partner, and his idea is to support himself and in the not-too-distant future to buy his own house, with much effort, in order to live peacefully.

Hernán is a agricultural producer. Next to him is a loyal friend, his cow, to which he has given sustenance.

Because he is so young, there is still much for him to learn, but as for all producers, a thorn in his side is developing: the low selling price for milk.

Hernán at this time only works and continues being loyal to his profession. He wants to apply for a loan to buy a pregnant cow.  She has a high price, equal to what he is asking. He promises to make his payments punctually, since if you support him, you are giving him the opportunity to grow.

loans.use: to buy a pregnant cow

loans.name: Dewi

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the new Ruma agents, Dewi. Dewi lives in Yogyakarta, a city located about a 15-hour drive from Jakarta, or only one hour by airplane. She lives there with her husband and her three children (two daughters and one son). She owns a small stall where she sells daily consumer products and provides mobile payment services to her community. Dewi is a cheerful and hardworking woman and her customers see her as a trusted mobile provider.

Dewi joined Ruma two months ago. She knew of Ruma from her friend who already was an agent and she decided to join Ruma because she wanted to learn to expand her business. With support from Ruma’s staff, Dewi sees some improvements in her business. As the business grows, Dewi is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Dewi improve her business and accordingly, her community who needs access to such services.

As seen in the photo, Dewi is the one who is smiling and standing in her own small stall. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services to her community

loans.name: Maria Alexandra

texts.es:
María Alexandra es una mujer soltera cabeza de familia de 40 años de edad ella a lo largo de su vida siempre había sido empleado pero de momento ha entrado en una etapa donde se encuentra desempleada y no ha podido conseguir un empleo, situación que la tiene muy estresada, ahora con ayuda de personas allegadas le sugieren iniciar un negocio pues saben de su situación de que en su casa la esperan tres hijos, alimentarlos, darles estudio, multiplicarse para que sus retoños sean personas de bien para la sociedad. 
Con la ayuda de un préstamo María Alexandra quiere  iniciar con su venta de comidas rápidas.
Con el monto solicitado comprara el carro de comidas, comprara los utensilios, y los respectivos insumos como lo son  platos, vasos, cucharas, tenedores, cuchillos desechables, aluminio, y papel chicle para empacar, empaques de hamburguesa, perros, y víveres para realizar los alimentos.
texts.en:
María Alexandra is a single 40-year-old woman who is the head of her family.  She has always been employed throughout her life but at the moment she has entered into a stage where she finds herself unemployed and hasn't been able to find work, a situation that she finds very stressful.  

Her close family suggested that she start a business because they are aware of her situation. She has three (dependent) children at home to feed and provide with schooling. She has to take on many roles so her little ones can become good people in society.  

With the help of a loan, María Alexandra wants to start a fast food business.  She will use the requested amount to buy a food cart, utensils, and supplies such as plates, glasses, spoons, forks, disposable knives, aluminum foil, and gum paper for wrapping, as well as packets of hamburger, hot dogs, and ingredients to make the food.

loans.use: to buy a food cart, utensils, and supplies to start a fast food business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy traditional fabric for resale.

loans.name: Camilo De Jesus

texts.es:
Un negocio heredado de su familia recibió en el año 2000 Camilo quien es un hombre de 41 años de edad, padre una hija de 18 años vive junto a su pareja y todos los días asiste su ganando, su actividad principal es criar ganado de engorde, los recibe desde bebes y su trabajo es alimentarlos, vacunarlos, engordarlos y posteriormente venderlos.
En su negocio siempre ha tratado de seguir un horizonte y apunta todos los días a lograrlo que es poder generar empleo, aumentar siempre su utilidad y mantener su negocio que un día espera que asuma su hija. 
Su sueño más inmediato es poder comprar una vivienda propia, más cerca de la finca, en una zona que tenga un clima más regular y con pasto más nutritivo.
Ahora la razón por la cual se encuentra camilo contándoles un poco su historia es que quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar 4 novillos, la razón es que tuvo algunas ventas pero apoya a toda su familia, el estudio de su hija, y pagar las cuotas pro crédito para él es más viable pues seguirá ocupándose de su familia que es lo primordial.
texts.en:
Camilo inherited a business from his family in the year 2000. He is a man of 41, the father of an 18-year-old daughter. He lives with his partner, and every day he tends to his cattle. His principal activity is raising cattle. He receives them as babies, and his work is to feed them, vaccinate them, fatten them, and later sell them.

In his business he has always tried to follow the horizon and aim every day to achieve it, which is to generate employment, always increase his profits, and maintain his business, which he hopes that his daughter will one day take over.

His most immediate dream is to be able to buy his own house, closer to the farm, in a zone that has a more regular climate and with more nutritious pasture.

Now the reason why Camilo is telling you a little of his story is that he wants to apply for a loan to buy four steers. The reason is that he had some sales but he helped all his family and [paid for] his daughter's schooling. To pay the bills through a loan is more viable for him, since he will continue to take care of his family, which is the essential thing.

loans.use: to buy four steers to take advantage of his pastures, so that he can improve his business and buy a house

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 53 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en el distrito de Colasay, una comunidad de clima variado su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus vecinos. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is 53 years old.  He lives with his wife and children in the district of Colasay, a community with a varied climate.  Its population works in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding.  It is located in the province of Jaen, which belongs to the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works in agriculture, especially growing coffee.  He has business experience and good personal and work references from his neighbors.  He has requested a loan to buy manure and compost for maintaining his crops.  That way, he can generate more income for his family, which will permit him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer for maintaining his crops.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 61 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa e hija de 14 años en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive el cliente es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con 20 años de experiencia en esta actividad y sus vecinos brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, esta inversión le permitirá ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Santiago is 61 years old.  He lives in his own house, made of rustic material, along with his wife and 14-year-old daughter.  They live in the district of Querocotillo, which is located in the province of Cutervo, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.  The community where the client lives is a small rural zone, where the population works in agriculture, trade, and raising animals.

He works growing coffee.  He has 20 years of experience in this business, and his neighbors provide very good personal and work references for him.  He will use the loan to invest in the purchase of compost and fertilizer for maintaining his coffee crops.  This investment will allow him to make profit, in order to improve his economic condition and, as such, invest in better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer for maintaining his coffee crops.

loans.name: Usep

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma's agents, Usep. Usep lives in Tasikmalaya, located about four hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall, where he sells mobile phone accessories and provides mobile payment services for his community. 

With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Usep sees improvements in his business. As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Know about the importance: Your loan will be very useful to help Usep improve his business and his community, who need access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Usep is sitting in his own stall. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for his community

loans.name: Dede

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it's time for you to meet one of Ruma's agents, Dede. Dede lives in Sumedang, located about four hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall, where he provides mobile payment services for his community. Dede is a high school student. Even though he is still a student, he has a really big spirit to become an entrepreneur. He wants to learn to increase his savings starting from a very early age as well as to contribute more to his community. 

With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Dede sees improvements in his business. As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Know about the importance: Your loan will be very useful to help Dede improve his business and, accordingly, support his community, who need access to such services. 

In the photo, Dede is the one who is looking at Ruma's banner. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for his community

loans.name: Imprimerie La Fayette

texts.en:
Walner inherited a sense of doing business from his family. In fact, his relatives were always involved in education in the country.

He launched his business in mid-2000 to offer quality services to customers. After a first loan from Zafen, he grew the customer service. Now, Walner is in need of modern equipment such as one multicolor printer, two bookbinding machines, and some maintenance tools.

Your contribution can help him purchase the equipment and create jobs in the community.

loans.use: to purchase a printer, book binding machine, and maintenance tools.

loans.name: Maria Ysabel

texts.es:
María Ysabel tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún , una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como menestras, arroz, leche, aceite, entre otros, son una familia emprendedora que se esfuerza por la labor que realiza, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos que brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Ysabel is 35 years old.  She lives with her husband and children in the district of Oyotún, a rural zone where the population works in agriculture, trade, and raising cattle.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the north coast of Peru.

She works selling groceries, such as legumes, rice, milk, and oil, among others.  They are an enterprising family that makes a great effort in the work they do.  She has experience in this business and established customers who provide very good personal and work references for her.  She has requested a loan to buy a greater quantity of merchandise to stock up her business.  That way, she can generate more income for her family, which will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of merchandise to stock up her business.

loans.name: Moeng

texts.en:
Moeng, 37, is a married man from Kampong Speu Province. He has three children who are currently in school. He is a construction worker with daily earnings of $5.50. He has been in this career for five years. His wife, Sambo, 35, is a garment factory worker with daily earnings of $3.00. 

Recently, some parts of his house have deteriorated and they need to be fixed to provide a suitable living for the household. Due to lack of funds, he has applied for a KIVA loan via HKL to pay for his house renovation. He and his family will be thankful to the lenders for helping them with the loan funded to improve their living standard.

loans.use: to pay for his house renovation

loans.name: Luz Yane

texts.es:
Luz Yane tiene 28 años, es soltera, es conocida en el medio por prestar servicio en la elaboración y venta de comidas. Vive en casa familiar con 02 hijos de 09 y 03 años respectivamente. Luz Yane cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. Su familia es muy unida y vive en una comunidad ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú, dicha comunidad está habitada por gente amable y respetuosa, que se dedican al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Luz Yane se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida como anticuchos, hamburguesas, ceviches, etc. desde hace más de 03 años aproximadamente. Ella necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de parrilla, utensilios y otros, con lo que pretende mejorar su servicio para poder captar un número mayor de clientes, lo que le generará mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia también mejoraran.
texts.en:
Luz Yane is 28 years old. She is single and well-known in the area for providing the service of preparing and selling meals. She lives in her family house with two children who are 9 and 3 years old, respectively. Luz Yane has good personal and work-related references. Her family is very supportive. She lives in a community located in the Cayaltí district, in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region of Peru's northern coast. This community is inhabited by courteous and respectful people who work in commerce, farming, and livestock production. 

Luz Yane has earned her living preparing and selling meals like kebabs, hamburgers, ceviche, etc., for more than three years, approximately. She needs a loan in order to invest in the purchase of a grill, utensils, and other items. With this investment, she hopes to attract a larger number of customers, which will generate a better income and better profits; as a result, her quality of life and that of her family will also improve.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a grill, utensils, and other items, with which she intends to improve her service in order to attract a larger number of customers

loans.name: Meliza

texts.en:
Meliza is 33 years old and married with two children who are in school. Meliza works very hard to provide for them.

Meliza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, eggs, coffee, shampoo and groceries.

Meliza has been in this business for 5 years now. 

In the future, Meliza would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, eggs, coffee, shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Elvis Gunnar

texts.es:
Elvis tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, sin hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente y sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como pavos, gallinas y palomas, cuenta con un amplio espacio (corral) donde puede criar a sus animales, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 8 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio, con esto Elvis espera poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que mejorarán su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elvis is 55 years old, in a common law relationship, with no children. He lives with his family in the Oyotún District, a rural zone in the Chiclayo province, of the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Perú. Life in this district is tranquil and citizens there make a living mainly from agriculture and livestock. He works raising and selling poultry such as turkeys, chickens and doves. He has a large poultry yard where he can raise them; his business is located at the same address. He has more than 8 years of experience and has a regular clientele, who give him very good personal and professional references.

He is requesting this loan to buy more poultry and increase his business stock, as well as to acquire feed for their fattening. Such investment will help him have a larger poultry variety and larger production, which will greatly influence his business. Elvis hopes to satisfy the varied tastes and needs of the zone’s clientele, which will allow him to improve his income, as well as his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: purchase more poultry poultry to increase his business stock and to acquire feed for their fattening

loans.name: Boniflor

texts.en:
Boniflor is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Boniflor is 30 years old and has one child in school.

Boniflor has a fishing business in the Philippines. Boniflor requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business.

Boniflor has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Boniflor would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business

loans.name: Ma. Merlinda

texts.en:
Ma. Merlinda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Ma. Merlinda is 58 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Ma. Merlinda has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Ma. Merlinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell.

Ma. Merlinda has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is a is a very hard working entrepreneur. Gilda is 49 years old and has one child in school.

Gilda has a fishing business in the Philippines. Gilda requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and materials needed for her business.

Gilda has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Gilda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and materials needed for her business

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rowena is 27 years old and has one child in school.

Rowena has a fishing business in the Philippines. Rowena requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Rowena has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Rowena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Meycil

texts.en:
Meycil works hard to support her family. Meycil is single woman with three children and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Meycil requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell like radish, cabbage, eggplant, etc.

Meycil has been in this business for 1 year now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell like radish, cabbage, eggplant, pitchay, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Isabel is 28 years old and has one child in school.

Isabel has a fishing business in the Philippines. Isabel requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Isabel has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Isabel would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 26 years old and has two children. Catherine is a woman and has two children who are in school.

Catherine is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Catherine requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Catherine has been in this business for 2 years now, and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Catherine would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Severina

texts.en:
Severina is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Severina is 64 years old and has four children who are in school.

Severina has a fishing business in the Philippines. Severina requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing materials.

Severina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Severina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing materials

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
At a tender age, starting a new family and home with a small piece of land is a challenge for people in the Nyamira area of Kenya. Daniel, the father of one, has overcome this challenge and has been practicing mixed farming for the past three years. His primary source of income has been selling eggs, milk and some personal business he engages in to supplement his meager income. 

Daniel passionately loves poultry farming and feeding his poultry makes him very proud. Waking up every day in the morning to collect eggs from his poultry makes him feel fulfilled. Although this humble father makes a profit through selling poultry, the biggest challenge he faces is meeting the demand of the market that is available. 

He is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Through Juhudi Kilimo, which is an institution that serves poor, small-landholding farmers, Daniel has acquired both financial and technical training. With the loan, he intends to increase his egg production from one crate a day to three crates a day. A crate of eggs goes for 450 KES, and with three crates, he will be making 1,350 KES per day. With the loan, he will be able to increase his income and move from subsistence to more commercial farming. With this loan, he will be able to improve his living conditions and enhance his food security and that of his community.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 27 years old and has three children. Rowena is married, and one child is in school.

Rowena is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Rowena requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rowena has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Saefudin

texts.en:
Saefudin lives in Cirebon, located about five hour’s drive from Jakarta. He owns a small stall where he provides mobile payment services for his community. Saefudin joined Ruma since 2014 and this is the second time he is applying for a loan from Kiva. He knew about Ruma from one of their sales executives who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his business, as well as increase his saving and to increase his  contributions to his community. 

With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Saefudin sees improvements in his business. As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Your loan will be very useful to help Saefudin improve his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Saefudin is the one who is holding the phone. He is very thankful for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for his community.

loans.name: Bonthan

texts.en:
Bonthan, 25 year old, lives in a rural area of Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. He has only one little child. He works in a private factory which is located near his house. On average, he is able to earn USD $5 a day. So far, he has been in this career for two years.

Currently, he would like to request a KIVA loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. This loan will allow him to have a personal vehicle so that he can experience a convenient way of travelling. He is thankful to all lenders for the financial support. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Youn

texts.en:
Youn, 58, lives in a community of Pursat Province, Cambodia. She has three children. 

To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland that is located near her house. So far, she has been in this type of business for 15 years. On average, she is able to make an income of USD $10 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara tiene 33 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa propia con sus menores hijos de 15 y 9 años en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores del distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y refrescos como cebada, chicha y soya con más de 5 años en este negocio, cuenta con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias de ella en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerveza y bebidas para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Sara espera atender las diversas necesidad y gustos de sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Sara is 33 years old, single and lives in her own home with her children, ages 15 and 19, in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén, Catamarca region in the mountainous north of Peru. The citizens of her district mainly make a living in farming, livestock and commerce. Sara makes a living selling beer and refreshments such as fermented barley, corn (chicha) and soy. She has regular customers who give her very strong references in her area. She plans to use the loan to purchase a larger supply of beer and other drinks to increase her stock, with which she hopes to tend to the diverse needs and tastes of her customers and generate more income to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: purchase beer and other drinks to increase her stock.

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Monina is 46 years old, and three of her children are still in school.

Monina has a bakery business in the Philippines. Monina requested a 9,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

Monina has been in this business for two years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business

loans.name: Melodina

texts.en:
Melodina is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Melodina is 45 years old and has one child in school.

Melodina has a buying and selling of vegetables business in the Philippines. Melodina requested a 5,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Melodina has been in this business for three years. In the future, Melodina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамара, 53 года, замужем, мать 5 детей. Образование среднее, уже много лет занимается полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Тамары в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 0,63 Га земли, на которой расположен парник и где Тамара выращивает капусту, огурцы, помидоры, экологически чистые и очень вкусные они пользуются большим спросом. Тамара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 140,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян растений, минеральных и органических удобрений, часть средств направит на приобретение 3 бычков для откорма. На полученные доходы от кредита Тамара планирует и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота, чтобы иметь возможность построить еще одну теплицу.
texts.en: Tamara is 53 years old, married and a mother of 5 children. She has a secondary education and has been involved in farming for many years. Thanks to Tamara's hard work, today she has 0.63 hectares of land, where she has a greenhouse, and where Tamara grows cabbage, cucumbers, tomatoes - all ecologically-clean and very delicious vegetables that are in high demand. Tamara requested a loan in the amount of 140,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy vegetable seeds, mineral and organic fertilizers and also to buy 3 bulls for fattening up. Tamara plans to continue increasing her livestock headcount with the earnings from the loan in order to be able to build another greenhouse.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, mineral and organic fertilizers and also to buy 3 bulls for fattening up in order to save money to increase her livestock headcount and build another greenhouse

loans.name: Huriyat

texts.ru: Хурият 61 год, замужем, есть сын. У Хурият среднее образование, она на пенсии, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она вместе с супругом занимаются животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Хурият, ее хозяйство на сегодняшний день насчитывает 3 коровы. Бизнес в целом приносит до 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Хурият обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки 4 коров  для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Хурият планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Huriyat is 61 years, married and has a son. Huriyat has a secondary education, is retired and, to provide the primary income for her family, she and her husband are involved in animal husbandry. Thanks to Huriyat's hard work, today her farm contains 3 cows. The business all together yields up to 20,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to further develop her business, Huriyat requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to increase her livestock headcount by buying 4 cows for fattening up and resale. Huriyat plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock quantities.

loans.use: to increase her livestock headcount by buying 4 cows for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Ainazhan

texts.ru: Айнажан, 54 года, замужем, дети взрослые и самостоятельные. У Айнажан высшее образование, уже 25 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав с суммы 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Айнажан на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы. На 4,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает перец, пшеницу и клевер. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка коровы и корма для скота. Доходы от кредита Айнажан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, также планирует увеличить поголовье скота.
texts.en: Ainazhan is 54 years old, married and has grown and independent children. Ainazhan has a college education and has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for 25 years, after starting this business with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Ainazhan's hard work, today her farm contains 4 cows. She grows pepper, wheat and clover on 4.0 hectares of leased land. In order to further develop her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy a cow and livestock feed. Ainazhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business and also plans to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy a cow and livestock feed in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 40 years old and married. She has four children who are in school. 

Aida is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Aida would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn is 43 years old and married. She has four children, with one child in school.

Arlyn is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies. She has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Arlyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies

loans.name: Hillary

texts.en:
Hillary is a 26-year-old farmer from Koibotek village in the North Rift region of Kenya. He is blessed with a lovely family and has been doing mixed-farming for 5 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs and earnings from side businesses. 

Hillary enjoys milking. Milking to him is a hobby in itself. However, he has not been milking recently since his cow was pregnant. The cow delivered, but he is still sparing the milk for the calf. This whole situation has had an effect on his livelihood. His own family has not been getting much milk, and also his income has been cut. 

Hillary is seeking a loan to purchase a highly productive dairy cow which will produce more milk every day than an average cow. This will get him back on his feet after months of low income. Having an additional cow will also cushion him against losses associated with such scenarios in the future. Returns from this investment will help him to meet some of the high farming-related costs. 

When he was asked how his family would benefit if he was granted this loan, he said, "The loan will increase my number of dairy animals. I will use the returns to build a dairy unit that will boost my milk production. The extra income as a result of this loan will help me take better care of my family and meet their needs."

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Gelly

texts.en:
Gelly is 32 years old and married with two children. With her two children in school, Gelly works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like liquor, canned goods, groceries, etc. She has been in this business for 4 years now. 

In the future, Gelly would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like liquor, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Myra

texts.en:
Myra works hard to support her family. She is married with six children and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Myra has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell. She has been in this business for 15 years now, and also earns additional income from fishing.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Akossiwavi

texts.fr: Akossiwavi est âgée de 47 ans et vit avec ses trois enfants dans le quartier de Dalivo. Akossiwavi travaille parfaitement pour venir en aide aux différents besoins de sa famille. Akossiwavi vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans sa boutique  pour trouver un revenu pouvant couvrir leurs charges quotidiennes. Akossiwavi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au grand marché Lomé. Pour avoir plus de revenu Akossiwavi demande ce prêt pour acheter d’autres produits destinés à la vente et favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Akossiwavi is 47 years old and lives with her three children in the Dalivo district.  Akossiwavi manages very well to earn enough to cover the various needs of her family.  She sells general food products in her shop and provides for their day-to-day expenses.

Four times a month, Akossiwavi buys her supplies from the main market in Lomé.  She has requested this loan as she would like to increase her earnings to cover the costs of her childrens' education.

loans.use: to buy 1 box of milk and a box of toilet rolls for resale.

loans.name: Vivencia

texts.en:
Vivencia is 45 years old and has four children, three of whom are in school. Vivencia is married.

Vivencia is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Vivencia requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Vivencia has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Vivencia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Neriza

texts.en:
Neriza is 38 years old and has three children; one child is still in school. Neriza is married.

Neriza is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Neriza requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. Neriza has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Maya

texts.ru: Мая, 35 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, уже много лет занимается полеводством, выращивая клевер, перец и другие сельскохозяйственные культуры. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 15 овец и 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мая обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), полученные средства она направит на покупку 3 коров. Доходы от бизнеса помогут улучшить благосостояние Маи, а также дать достойное образование ее детям.
texts.en:
Maya is 35, married, and a mother of four children.  She has a secondary school education with some vocational training, and has been a farmer for many years, growing clovers, pepper, and other crops.  She also has 2 cows, 15 sheep and 2 horses on her farm, and her monthly income can be as high as 15,000 som per month.    

For the future development of her farm, Maya has requested a loan of 100,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to go towards buying 3 cows.  The extra income from her business will help improve Maya's living conditions and allow her to give her children a quality education.

loans.use: buy three cows in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 36 years old and married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like canned goods, noodles, milk, coffee, spices, etc.

Rosalie has borrowed and repaid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like canned goods, noodles, milk, coffee, spices, etc.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est une femme âgée de 38 ans. Akouvi vit avec ses deux enfants dans le quartier de Daliko. Akouvi désire contribuer activement à l’épanouissement de ses enfants qui sont à sa charge et vend de la boisson locale communément appelée Tchoukoutchou préparée à base du mil. Cette activité lui génère un gain favorable afin de venir en aider aux besoins de son foyer. Akouvi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter les sacs de mil, Akouvi sollicite ce crédit pour son financement et réaliser une bonne rentabilité pour favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Akouvi is 38 years old.  She lives with her two children in the Daliko district.  As she would like to improve the living conditions of her children (for whom she is responsible), she produces Tchoukoutchou (a drink prepared from millet).  Her business provides a profit which Akouvi uses to meet the needs of her household.

Four times a month, Akouvi buys her supplies from the market.  She has requested this loan in order to buy sacks of millet, generate a good profit and pay for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of millet for her drinks making business.

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en:
Touch’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal Province in Cambodia. 

Touch makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses. It will also save them time as they won't need to collect fuel and boil the water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene is 39 years old and has two children who are in school. Mylene is married.

Mylene is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Mylene requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock. Mylene has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mylene would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Nila

texts.en:
Nila works hard to support her family. Nila is a married woman with five children. She has a business raising pigs in the Philippines.

Nila requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Nila has been in this business for one year now, and also earns additional income from fish vending.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 52 years old and married with three children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. 

Nilda is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Nilda has been in this business for one year and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco, utilizo el préstamo anterior para adquirir lácteos para ofrecer a sus clientes productos frescos y mejorar las ventas, su calidad de vida familiar está cambiando positivamente y el negocio no ha presentado ninguna dificultad en este tiempo.
Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar una vaca y vitaminas para la misma, de esta manera fortalecerá el negocio, espera ir produciendo lácteos para cubrir las demandas de sus clientes y continuar generando ingresos para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco used his last loan to buy dairy products in order to sell fresh products to his customers and increase sales. Francisco’s and his family’s quality of life is changing for the better while the business is not having any problems.

Francisco is applying for another loan to buy a cow and vitamins in order to strengthen his business. Francisco hopes to continue producing dairy products to meet customers’ demands and continue earning an income and move forward with his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow and vitamins in order to strengthen his business.

loans.name: Servando

texts.es:
Servando tiene 33 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus cinco menores hijos en casa propia en el Distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en unidad móvil de su propiedad (mototaxi), cuenta con más de 06 años de experiencia en el rubro, por lo que tiene mucha experiencia y buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de ganado caprino. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de otro vehículo así como para brindar mantenimiento a su actual vehículo ya que se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Servando espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Servando is 33 years old and has a partner. He lives with her and their five children, all of whom are under the age of 18. Servando and his family live in a privately-owned house in the Pomahuaca district of Jaén province in the Cajamarca region of Peru’s northern coast. The people here mainly work in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

Servando himself makes a living providing public transport services in his motorcycle taxi. He has more than six years’ experience with this work and so has good references from locals. Servando also raises goats.

This loan will be used to buy another vehicle and carry out repairs on his current vehicle, which is currently not in very good condition. Servando hopes that this loan will allow him to provide his customers with better service. In turn, Servando hopes that this will have a positive impact on his income and allow him to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy another vehicle and carry out repairs on his current vehicle, which is currently not in very good condition.

loans.name: Mario Rodolfo

texts.es:
