Mario, está viviendo en compañía de su familia, cada día se esfuerza para generar ingresos con los que puede solventar las necesidades de su hogar y apoyar a sus dos hijos para que puedan tener acceso a  educación, no recibe ayuda económica del extranjero, realiza el negocio de compra y reventa de pan de manera ambulante en su bicicleta, lo hace ya varios años, en un horario de cinco de la mañana a ocho de la mañana.
Está solicitando un crédito para comprar una motocicleta en la que podrá salir a vender pan todos los días, su objetivo es visitar otras zonas para tener nuevos clientes, mejorar sus ingresos, reducir el tiempo de su jornada de trabajo, además la motocicleta será utilizada como transporte personal para realizar otras actividades.
Sus aspiraciones son seguir trabajando con créditos para mejor su negocio, tener ingresos estables para cubrir sus deudas y salir adelante con sus compromisos familiares.
texts.en:
Mario lives with his family. Every day he works hard in order to earn an income to cover household costs and support his two children so that they might be able to have an education. Mario receives no financial support from family living abroad.

Mario has a business buying and selling bread as a street vendor. Working on his bicycle, he has had this business for a number of years, working from 5am until 8am.

Mario is applying for a loan in order to buy a motorcycle so that he can go out to sell bread every day. His aim is to visit other areas and thus have more customers. He wants to increase his income and reduce travel time. He can also use the motorcycle for personal errands.

Mario aspires to continue working with loans in order to improve his business and to have a stable income to pay off his debts. He wants to move forward with his family commitments.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle in order to go out and sell bread every day.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new shaver, to offer better service to his customers, and to have the opportunity to continue working.

loans.name: Silvia Lorena

texts.es:
Silvia, ha mantenido la venta de frutas y verduras funcionando, gracias a la ayuda del préstamo anterior,  posee una situación económica mucho más estable y ya le han asignado un puesto en el mercado municipal.
Las demandas han incrementado y como la institución le da un buen servicio, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para comprar variedad de frutas y verduras frescas, abastecerá su negocio con el producto que sea necesario para que sus clientes estén satisfechos.
texts.en: Silvia has kept up the sales of fruit and vegetables thanks to her previous loan. Her financial situation is much more stable and she has been allocated a place in the municipal market. Demand has increased and as the institution provides her with a good service, she has decided to request a new loan to buy a variety of fresh fruit and vegetables and stock up her business with the necessary produce to satisfy customer demand.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fresh fruit and vegetables to stock up her business with the necessary produce to satisfy customer demand

loans.name: Ovidio Otilio

texts.es: Ovidio de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, y también trabaja como fotógrafo, tiene 40 años de experiencia en el cultivo, almacena sus productos en sacos asi como muestra la fotografía, con las ganancias que obtiene en su trabajo es como logra salir adelante, Ovidio ya ha solicitado anteriormente un crédito, y esta nuevamente solicitando otro pero en esta ocasión es para la compra de insumos agrícolas (semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc.) para poder aumentar la cosecha y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ovidio, 60, lives in his own house with his wife and daughter.  He grows corn and beans and also works as a photographer.  He has 40 years' experience in crop growing and stores his grain in sacks like those in the picture.  He uses the profits from his work to support himself.

Ovidio has had a previous loan and this new loan is to buy farm supplies (seeds, fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, etc.) to increase crop production and earn more income.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies (seeds, fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, etc.)

loans.name: Carlos Agustin

texts.es: Carlos de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de pepino, maíz y frijol, desde hace varios años, inicio su trabajo con capital propia, vende sus productos a compradores independientes  y con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, pero la producción y ventas a ido a aumentando, y ya no tiene suficiente capital para comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. por esa razón solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de lo antes mencionado y así mejorar la producción para tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Carlos is 56 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He has been growing cucumbers, corn and beans for several years. He started up with his own capital and he sells his produce to independent buyers and he gets by with the profit he makes. However, his production and sales have been growing and he no longer has enough capital to buy the consumables he needs such as fertilizer, manure, pest control etc. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the aforementioned products and so improve his production to obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy the consumables he needs such as fertilizers, manure and pest control etc.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
La socia Nieves se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de zapatos,la socia es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar zapatos para varones y mujeres.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nieves continues with her shoe selling business.  She is a hard-working, determined woman who wants to provide for her family through her work.  The loan she is requesting is to buy men's and women's shoes.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy men's and women's shoes.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco, vive con sus padres, está soltero, se dedica únicamente a atender su negocio el cual consiste en vender ropa usada y nueva, además ofrece a sus clientes el servicio de dibujante y rotulación, el oficio lo aprendió como ayudante en otro negocio, posteriormente su familia le brindó apoyo para fundar su propio negocio, ya tiene 3 años de poseerlo.
Invertirá en papelería, colores, pintura, etc., y fardos de ropa, tendrá materiales para realizar los trabajos de dibujo y rotulación, asimismo actualizara la venta de ropa, será de utilidad para atender mejor a sus clientes, aumentar las ventas e ingresos.
Los sueños que tiene Francisco son fortalecer mejor su negocio, cancelar su deuda y apoyar con los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Francisco is single and lives with his parents.  His only means of income is his business selling used and new clothing, and his signage and drawing services.  He learned the trade as an assistant at a company; later his family gave him the opportunity to set up his own business which has been running for three years now.

He plans to buy stationery goods, colors, paint, etc., as well as packs of clothing.  This will give him the materials he needs for his drawing and signage work, and allow him to sell new clothing to attract more customers and increase sales and income.

Francisco's goals are to strengthen his business, pay off debt and help with family expenses.

loans.use: To buy stationery goods, colors, paint, etc., as well as clothing.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es:
María, vive con su familia, cuatro personas son dependientes, ofrece el servicio de cortes de cabello, aprendió a desarrollar está actividad cuando trabajaba como ayudante, el negocio lo tiene desde hace 20 años y lo tiene instalado en su vivienda.
Necesita capital para comprar una máquina de cortar pelo y un espejo, le ayudara para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, sus riesgos son que el equipo este dañado y no pueda realizar su trabajo, espera tener mejor situación económica para resarcir su deuda.
Sus sueños son establecer una sala de belleza y brindar a su familia mejores circunstancias de vida.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her family of four dependent people.  She cuts hair, which she learned to do while working as an assistant.  She has been in business for 20 year and works out of her home.

She needs a loan to buy a hair trimmer and a mirror so she can offer better customer service.  Her current equipment is damaged so she is unable to do a good job.  She hopes to improve her economic situation to pay off debt.

Her goal is to establish a beauty salon and give her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a hair trimmer and mirror so she can offer better customer service.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
Felicita, dice que su negocio de elaboración y comercialización de piezas de loza está creciendo y generándole un poco más de ganancias, por lo que se siente agradecida con Padecomsm y los inversionistas Kiva, por haberle ayudado con el crédito anterior, su familia tiene una vida cotidiana con mejor alimentación.
Por la responsabilidad que la caracteriza está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar nacazcol, barro, leña y arcilla, para tener materia prima para elaborar los nuevos pedidos de las piezas de barro que vende.
texts.en:
Felicita says her pottery business is growing and generating more profit, for which she is grateful to Padecomsm and Kiva lenders for the previous loan she received.  Her family now has better food on the table.

With the responsible attitude she is known for, Felicita is requesting a new loan to buy coloring, clay and firewood to have the materials on hand to fill new orders for the pottery she sells.

loans.use: To buy coloring, clay, and firewood to make the pottery she sells.

loans.name: Monfaye

texts.fr: Monfaye est une femme veuve avec cinq enfants à sa charge. Monfaye vit à  Daliko et est âgée de 36 ans. Pour réaliser ses gains, Monfaye vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans son quartier et trouve un revenu pouvant couvrir ses charges mais nécessite réaliser plus de bénéfice. Pour disposer de son stock, Monfaye s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Monfaye sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des cartons de spaghettis et de tomates afin de satisfaire favorablement ses consommateurs.
texts.en: Monfaye is a widow with five children in her care. She is 36 years old and lives in Daliko. In order to make money, Monfaye sells groceries in her neighborhood and generates enough income to cover her expenses; nevertheless she needs to make more profit. In order to have sufficient stock, she gets supplies four times a month at the market. Monfaye is requesting this loan so she can buy cartons of spaghetti and tomatoes to satisfy her consumers adequately.

loans.use: to buy a carton of spaghetti and a carton of tomatoes.

loans.name: Duguyiriwaton Group

texts.fr:
Perting est celui qui a la main sur le bœuf. Agé de 53 ans Perting est  emboucheur vivant dans une commune rurale au mali avec son épouse ménagère et ses 5 enfants dont 2 scolarisés, âgée de20 à 9 ans.
L’activité économique de Perting c’est acheté les animaux maigres, les engraissés et les revendre. Pour la pratique de son activité, il s’approvisionne au marché local de son village et fait sa vente au comptant au même marché. Il exerce cette activité pendant  quelques ans, il souhaitera assurer l’amélioration des conditions de vie de la famille et le bien-être de ses enfants surtout à l’éducation et nourriture suffisante. Il est alphabétisé et se sert les revenus de son activité pour faire face à ses propres besoins et de ses enfants. Le manque de moyen à pousser  Perting à contracter le prêt auprès du RMCR pour faire son embouche, il n’a aucun problème pour exercer cette activite.
texts.en:
Perting is the man who has his hand on the bull in the photo. He is 53 years old and raises animals; he lives in a rural commune in Mali with his wife, who is a housewife, and his five children, ranging from nine to 20 years old, two of whom are at school. 

Perting's business is buying lean animals, fattening them and then reselling them. In order to carry out his business, he gets his supplies at the local market in his village and sells his animals at the same market. He has been carrying out this activity for a few years and would like to be able to improve his family's living conditions as well as his children's well-being, above all their education and nutrition. He is literate and uses the income from his business to provide for his own needs and those of his children. The lack of resources has encouraged Perting to get a loan from RMCR to carry out his fattening business and he has no problem in exercising this activity.

loans.use: to buy bulls for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Agée de 43 ans, Akouvi  est une femme mariée vivant dans le quartier de Daliko avec ses trois enfants à sa charge. Akouvi est très dynamique et vend des chaussures pour femme et homme. Son activité lui procure le bénéfice pour venir en aide à son mari pour les besoins de la famille. Akouvi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché de Lomé. Akouvi demande ce crédit pour commander des cartons de chaussures pour vendre et gagner encore plus de revenus.
texts.en: Akouvi is a 43-year old married woman who lives in the Daliko district with her three dependant children. She is very dynamic and sells both mens' and womens' shoes. Her business generates enough profit for her to help her husband to provide for the family's needs. Akouvi gets her supplies four times a month at the market in Lomé. She is requesting this loan so she can order cartons of shoes to sell and make more money.

loans.use: to buy two cartons of shoes.

loans.name: Ana Marleny

texts.es: Ana de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, adicional a eso también vende frutas, inicio su trabajo con capital propio pero al ir aumento sus cultivos ha trabajado con préstamos, su cosecha la almacena en sacos como muestra la fotografía y la comercializa en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos durante todo el año, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con su familia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas para su cosecha de maíz y frijol y así poder mejorar su producción y calidad para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Ana is 43 years old. She lives in her own home with her life's companion. She grows corn and beans. In addition, she also sells fruit. She started her work with her own capital but while increasing her crops she has worked with loans. She stores her harvest in sacks as seen in the photograph and sells it in basic grains purchase and selling agencies all year long. With the earnings she gets she is able to get ahead with her family. She is asking for a loan to buy agricultural materials for her corn and bean harvests to improve her yield and quality to have better income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials for her corn and bean harvest.

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de zapatos ortopedicos,el socio es una persona trabajadora y luchador.El socio solicita el credito para comprar zapatos ortopedicos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues to work at his business of selling orthopedic shoes. He is a hardworking person and a fighter. He is asking for the loan to buy orthopedic shoes.

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy orthopedic shoes.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es:
José, requiere de un nuevo crédito debido a que tiene la oportunidad de comprar una vaca a buen precio y así ir mejorando su negocio para tener una mejor economía familiar.
El financiamiento anterior le sirvió para comprar insumos agrícolas con los que trato el terreno para cultivar granos básicos y ha obtenido una cosecha abundante con  la que alimenta mejor a su núcleo familiar y pudo comercializar una parte para tener ingresos con los que cancelo su deuda y costeo otros gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
José requires a new loan due to the fact that he has an opportunity to buy a cow at a good price and this way he can improve his business to have better family finances. 

The previous loan helped him to buy agricultural materials with which he treated the soil to grow basic grains. He has obtained an abundant crop with which he feeds his nuclear family and he was able to have income to pay off his debt and pay for other household expenses.

loans.use: to buy a cow at a good price and thus improve his business.

loans.name: Aïcha

texts.fr: A 33 ans, Aïcha est une femme veuve et avec son enfant elle vit dans le quartier de Sogbossito. Aïcha est une marchande de friperies et s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché Hédzanawoé. Aïcha réalise une très bonne rentabilité avec son activité génératrice de revenu. Aïcha nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des friperies afin de gagner plus de bénéfices et venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de son enfant.
texts.en: Aïcha is a 33-year old widow and lives with her child in the Sogbossito district. She is a second-hand clothing merchant and gets her supplies four times a month at the market in Hédzanawoé. Her income-generating activity is very profitable. She needs this loan to buy second-hand clothing so she can make even more profit and help out with her child's education.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Akuvi

texts.fr: Agée de 24 ans, Akuvi est une femme mariée et mère d’un seul enfant. Akuvi habite à Daliko et vend des pains en se promenant dans les quartiers. Akuvi s’approvisionne plusieurs fois dans le mois à la boulangerie. Akuvi souhaite répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients qui trouvent satisfaction. Akuvi  demande ce crédit pour commander des paniers de pain et avoir une marge de bénéfice pour couvrir ses charges quotidiennes
texts.en: Akuvi is a 24-year old married woman who is mother to an only child. She lives in Daliko and sells bread walking around various neighborhoods. She gets her supplies several times a month at the bakery. Akuvi would like to be able to meet the demand of her customers who are satisfied with her bread. She is requesting this loan to order baskets of bread and have sufficient profit margin to cover her daily outgoings.

loans.use: to buy two baskets of bread.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es: Leonardo de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene mas de 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, comenzó con capital propio y es su único trabajo para poder tener ingresos económicos, almacena sus cultivos en los graneros que muestra la fotografía y luego los comercializa en los pueblo aledaños, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas entre otras cosas para continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leonardo, 41, owns a house where he lives with his family. He has been growing corn and beans for more than fifteen years. He started this business with his own money, and it is his only source of income.

Leonardo stores his produce in the silos shown in the picture. He then sells it in surrounding towns, and gets ahead with the profits he makes.

Leonardo is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and other supplies he needs to work, improve his income, and live a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides and other agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Uriel

texts.es:
El socio Uriel se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artefactos, el socio es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora y por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar equipos de sonidos,televisores y refrigeradoras.
 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Uriel is a member that continues selling appliances. He is an entrepreneurial and hardworking person who wants to get ahead with this business.

Uriel is requesting a loan to buy sound systems, television sets and refrigerators. He is pleased with this loan and promises to pay the installments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy sound systems, television sets and refrigerators.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 25 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la actividad de cultivo de maíz y frijol,  posee 12 años de experiencia en el cultivo,  almacena sus productos en los graneros que muestra la fotografía y los comercializa en los mercados que están cerca de su casa ya posee clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas puede salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios para sus cultivos y asi poder tener una mejor producción y tener mas ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
This young man’s face is blurred because he is 25 years old and lives in a risky area. He has been growing corn and beans for twelve years, and stores them in the silos shown in the picture. He sells his produce at a nearby marketplace, and has a fixed customer base. He gets ahead with the sales he makes. He owns a house, where he lives with his life partner and two children. 

He is requesting a loan to buy the agricultural supplies he needs for his plantations, in order to improve his produce and his income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Marino De Jesus

texts.es:
Marino utilizo el préstamo anterior para fortalecer la venta de lácteos, actualmente atiende a nuevos clientes y sus ingresos están mejorando, no presenta dificultades para  continuar trabajando.
Está decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar quesos, quesillo, crema, cuajada y una hielera, espera surtir las nuevas demandas y tener equipo adecuado para conservar frescos sus productos cuando salga a vender casa por casa.
texts.en:
Marino used the previous loan to strengthen his dairy business. He has now new customers and his income is improving. He is not facing any obstacle that could impact his work.

He decided to request a new loan to buy different types of cheese, cream, curd, and an ice box. He hopes to cope with the growing demand and have the equipment he needs to keep his products fresh when he is selling door-to-door.

loans.use: to buy different types of cheese, cream, and curd to sell, and an ice box.

loans.name: Sayda

texts.es:
La socia Sayda se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de ventas de ganados y por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacara adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un ganado y alimento para los ganados.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Sayda continues to work in her livestock business. She is an enterprising, hard-working woman who wants to expand her business selling livestock. She wants to support her family through this business. She is requesting the loan to buy a cow and feed for her cattle. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a cow and feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Almost all Kenyans are farmers, and a large percentage of the food that people eat comes from people who sell in the rural marketplace. 

Justus is a 32-year-old mixed farmer based in Nyenyi, a remote village in the Nyamira area of Kenya. He is a proud father of three school-going children whom he truly loves and greatly adores. Justus describes his upbringing as challenging, so he is doing everything in his power to provide a good foundation for his children and to help secure their future. 

Justus has been farming for more than six years. Over the years he has gained much experience and is now considered to be one of the best farmers in his village because of the immense knowledge he possesses. Since he has excess food for dairy cattle and enough space on his land, Justus has always wanted to buy another dairy cow, but his challenge is a lack of finances. That is why Juhudi Kilimo is partnering with Kiva and Kiva lenders to help aspiring men like Justus to turn their dreams into reality. Justus believes the loan will help him to satisfy the demand for milk in his area and enable him to realize his dream of developing his business into a large enterprise. Many men in Kenya are responsible for not only producing food, but also feeding their family. Justus wants to provide all of the basic needs that his children and parents require. Justus is very disciplined with his finances and he knows that, with the accumulated profits, he will be able to fully repay his loan.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Danixa

texts.es:
La socia Danixa se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de materiales de construccion, la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es abrir otro local de venta de materiales de construccion.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cemento,pinturas, clavos y arena.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Danixa continues devoting herself to her construction material sales business. She is a hard-working woman who wants to support her family through this business. She dreams of opening another construction material sales outlet. She is requesting the loan to buy cement, paint, nails and sand.

Danixa is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, paint, nails and sand.

loans.name: Nonita

texts.en:
Nonita is a 46-year-old married woman with two children from Antequera, Bohol. Her oldest child is 21 while the youngest is 15. She has a basket weaving business. She makes native baskets in various shapes. It has been 10 years already that she has been weaving baskets. This is the source of her income. Her husband is a carpenter, who helps her to meet their daily needs.

Nonita has requested a loan to buy nito (palm), weaker (woven fiber formed into a rigid material) and buli (a kind of palm). These materials will enable her to weave more baskets to be delivered to her customers. She hopes that she will be able to improve their livelihood status and continue to finance the needs of her children. In the future, Nonita dreams of expanding her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy nito (palm), weaker (woven fiber formed into a rigid material) and buli (a kind of palm) for her basket weaving business

loans.name: Kimlang's Group

texts.en: Kimlang’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Kimlang makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and the men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica al cultivo de ajonjolí, y adicional a eso trabaja como jornal, así obtiene ingresos extras, el tiene 25 años de dedicarse a la siembra, vende sus productos en los pueblos aledaños con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel is 50 years old and lives in his own home with his family. He makes a living growing sesame seeds and also words as a day labourer to earn extra money. He has worked growing crops for 25 years, and sells his products in nearby towns. With his earnings he is able to pay some household expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilisers, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc. and improve his land which can be seen in the photograph. In this way, he hopes to boost his earnings and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc. and improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy doors, window balconies, and to pay installation costs.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es:
La socia Susan se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de camaras digitales,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es tener un local mas grande donde pueda vender las camaras.La socia solicita el credito para comprar camaras digitales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Susan continues to work at her business where she sells digital cameras. She is an enterprising and hard-working woman. Through this business, she is able to support her family. Her dream is to have bigger premises in which to sell cameras. She is requesting the loan to buy digital cameras.

Susan is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy digital cameras.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Sarina

texts.en:
Sarina is a 44-year old married woman with three children who are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Sarina has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Sarina has been in this business for five years. 

Sarina requested a 10,000 Philippine peso loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to purchase more fish to sell. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Vorn's Group

texts.en: Vorn’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Vorn makes a living cultivating rice, and he also does extra work as a farm laborer to support his family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Oeurn's Group

texts.en: Oeurn’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Oeurn makes a living cultivating rice, and he also does extra work as a farm laborer to support his family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Daen's Group

texts.en: Daen’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Daen makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: Maria es viuda y vive en casa propia con su hija de 15 años, ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos desde hace 10 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo las paredes de la parte principal de la casa que la que muestra la fotografía ya que están bien deterioradas, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de arena, cemento, hierro, ladrillos y pago de mano de obra y así poder tener una vivienda digna para ella y su hija.
texts.en:
Maria is a widow who lives in her own home with her 15-year-old daughter. She has made a living selling snacks for 10 years. With the money she makes from her sales she is able to pay some household expenses.

She wants to make improvements to her home, rebuilding the walls of the main part of her home, which, as can be seen in the photograph, are badly damaged. However, she doesn't make enough money from her sales to be able to do this, which is why she's requesting a loan to buy sand, cement, iron and bricks, and pay for labour, so that she and her daughter can live in a decent home.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron and bricks, and pay for labour.

loans.name: Jakelyn Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia Jakelyn Eulogia  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa , la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar casacas, blusas y pantalones.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner Jakelyn Eulogia continues selling clothes.  She's very hardwoking and through her business she's been able to move forward.  
The partner is requesting this loan to buy coats, blouses, and pants.  She's happy to receive the credit and she is committed to meet with her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy coats, blouses and pants..

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, su trabajo lo realiza durante todo el año y así poder obtener mejores ingresos, se dedica a esta actividad durante casi 15 años, comercializa sus cosechas en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel is 50 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and three children.  He plants corn and beans throughout the year in order to obtain better income.  He's been doing this work for 15 years.  He sells his harvest in the area around his residence and with the money he obtains from his sales he's able to cover some of his house expenses. 
He's requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and plague controls to continue with his work and have a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and plague control chemicals.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 45 years old and has one child. Gina is married, and her child is in school.

Gina is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Gina requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Gina has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
Florenda is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Florenda is 54 years old, and one of her children is in school.

Florenda has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Florenda requested an 8,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food stall.

Florenda has been in this business for five years. In the future, Florenda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food stall

loans.name: Jose Gregorio

texts.es: Jose de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace 40 años, comercializa todos los días del año en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes y abonos para sacar una mejor cosecha y asi tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José is sixty-two years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion. He has been raising corn for 40 years and sells it every day of the year in different markets near his home and with the proceeds, he is able to get ahead. José is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizers and manure to obtain a better crop and have a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es:
La socia Ingrid  se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia ya que la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar llantas y parabrisas para su carro.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Ingrid continues working in her transport business. By means of this business, she hopes to help her family get ahead because she is an enterprising and persistent woman. Ingrid is asking for this loan to buy tires and a windshield for her vehicle. She is happy to be approved for the loan and commits herself to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy tires and a windshield for her vehicle.

loans.name: Mario Ernesto

texts.es: Mario de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, desde hace varios años realiza esta actividad con la cual logra obtener ingresos para solventar los gastos de su hogar, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, pesticidas, formulas, sulfato, abono, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario is 38 years old and live in his own house with his sister.  He's been growing corn for a few years and with this income he's able to cover his house expenses.  He sells his products in different markets around his house.  
He's requesting this credit to buy seeds, pesticides, formulas, sulfates, and fertilizers to improve the land shown in the picture and thus be able to have a better income and provide his family with a bettr quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides, formulas, sulfates, and fertilizers to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol,  tiene 10 años de dedicarse a ese trabajo, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona y con las ventas que realiza es como puede obtener mejores ingresos, la joven es madre soltera y vive en casa propia con su hijo y su madre, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The young woman whose face has been pixelated because she's 29 yearss old and lives in a high risk area, has been growing corn and beans for 10 years.  She sells her products in the areas nearby her zone of residence and with the sales she's able to obtain a better income.  The young woman is a single mother and lives in her own house with her son and her mother.  
She's requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and plague control to improve the plot of land shown in the picture and be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and plague control to improve her land.

loans.name: Maria  Luisa

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de atoles y tortillas desde hace varios años, con las ventas que realiza es como logra salir adelante con los gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro perimetral en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero como no tiene suficiente capital, está solicitando un crédito para la compra cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own house with her husband and 4 daughters.  She works selling atole (a corn and masa based drink) and tortillas for a few years.  With her sales she manages to get ahead and pays for her house expenses.  
She wants to improve her house by building a cement fence in the space shown in the picture above but she doesn't have the money so she's requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars, and pay for labor so that her and her family can live safer.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars and pay for labor.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
In 2012, Roselyn learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. Roselyn tried her luck on doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

Roselyn borrowed another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help give her farming income a big boost. Roselyn looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seedlings and compost

loans.name: Santas

texts.en:
Santas is from Mahayag in the Philippines. She and her husband have agricultural land and earn a living through farming. 

Santas makes it a point to have good land preparation to have maximum yield and a good income. She recently needed a loan from Paglaum MPC to pay for the holing and planting of cassava and sweet potato seedlings on her land. 

She wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply her produce to the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for the holing and planting of cassava and sweet potato seedlings on her land

loans.name: Ma. Sheila

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Ma. Sheila works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Ma. Sheila is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to  purchase more fish to sell to her customers for her fish-vending business.

Ma. Sheila has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Teressa

texts.en:
Teressa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Teressa is 30 years old, and two children of her children are in school.

Teressa has a buying and selling of frozen foods business in the Philippines. Teressa requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy frozen foods to sell.

Teressa has been in this business for three years. In the future, Teressa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Susan requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net, bamboo and for maintenance for her boat.  She has been in this business for 10 years now, and also earns additional income from tailoring.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net, bamboo and for maintenance for her boat

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 60 years old and married with five children. Imelda works very hard to provide for them.

Imelda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 28,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like canned good, eggs, groceries, etc.

Imelda has been in this business for 25 years now. 

In the future, Imelda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned good, eggs, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Cecil

texts.en:
Cecil is 34 years old with three children.

Cecil works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like eggs and other groceries.

Cecil has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal.

Cecil aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like eggs and other groceries

loans.name: Rosa Nelly

texts.es:
Rosa, con la ayuda y buena inversión de los créditos sigue ofreciendo variedad de antojitos a sus clientes y mejorando su situación financiera, su familia se mantiene unida y con mejores condiciones de vida.
Opta por solicitar más capital para invertirlo en aceite, yuca, condimentos, papas, harina, pollo, etc., para elaborar la venta de antojitos, de esa manera seguirá trabajando y manteniendo su negocio competitivo.
texts.en:
Rosa, with the help and good investment of the loans, continues selling a variety of snacks to her customers.  She continues improving her financial situation, she keeps her family together, and they have better living conditions.

She decided to request more capital to invest in cooking oil, yucca, condiments, potatoes, flour, and chicken, etc. in order to make the food for the snacks.  This way she will continue working and keeping her business competitive.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, yucca, condiments, potatoes, flour, and chicken, etc.

loans.name: Roberto De Jesus

texts.es: Roberto de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 30 años, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Roberto está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, sulfato, formulas, abono, herbicidas, pesticida, etc. así como muestra en la fotografía para poder mejorar su cosecha y también sus ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto, 46, owns a house where he lives with his family. He has been growing grains for thirty years. He sells his produce in different areas surrounding his hometown. He manages to cover some home expenses with the sales he makes.

Roberto is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, sulfate, special formulations, herbicides, pesticides, and other agricultural supplies such as the ones shown in the picture. This will result in a better harvest and better income for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, sulfate, special formulations, herbicides, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de lato riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, comenzó trabajando con el papa, pero ahora tiene dos manzanas de terreno que cultiva propio desde hace algunos años, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con las ventas que realiza puede salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el esta solicitando un crédito para empezar a preparar el terreno y comprar todos los insumos agrícolas necesarios y asi poder seguir con su trabajo y mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en: The young man whose face is pixelated because he is 24 and lives in a high-risk area grows corn and beans. He began by working with his dad but he now has 1½ hectares of land on which he has been growing his crops for a number of years. He sells his produce in nearby towns, using the proceeds from his sales to cover his needs. he lives in his own home with his wife and son. He is applying for a loan to enable him to begin preparing his land and to buy all the agricultural supplies he needs. This will allow him to carry on his work and boost his income.

loans.use: to prepare his land and buy all the agricultural supplies he needs

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es: Jose de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el rubro por eso logra obtener buenas cosechas, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con sus ganancias logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas para preparar 2 mz. de tierra  y asi seguir con sus siembras para poder mejorar los ingresos económicos de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose, age 45, lives with his life partner in his own house.  He devotes himself to agriculture, and he grows corn.  He has ten years of experience in this line of work, and that is why he manages to get good harvests.  He sells his products in the outlying areas to where he lives.  He manages to get ahead with his earnings.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to prepare two ‘manzanas’ [a manzana is a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters] of land.  This way he will continue with his crops in order to be able to improve the family’s income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to prepare the land.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: Jose de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el rubro por eso logra obtener buenas cosechas, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con sus ganancias logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas para preparar 2 mz. de tierra  y asi seguir con sus siembras para poder mejorar los ingresos económicos de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose, age 52, lives with his family in his own house.  He devotes himself to agriculture, and he grows corn.  He has ten years of experience in this line of work, and that is why he manages to get good harvests.  He sells his products in the outlying areas to where he lives.  He manages to get ahead with his earnings.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to prepare two ‘manzanas’ [a manzana is a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters] of land.  This way he will continue with his crops in order to be able to improve the family’s income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to prepare the land.

loans.name: Olim

texts.en:
Olim is a hardworking man. He was born in 1973. He is living in a remote district. He is married and has four children. Olim is a capable, honest and active person.

He is an agrarian man and keeps livestock, for his family was given 1.5 hectares of land by a collective farm. Every year he plants cereals on this land. Additionally, for making their standard of living better, he flies to the Russian Federation for earning money.

Olim decided to work in his motherland, because of being far from his family. It was hard for him to work in the Russian Federation; he was used to working hard. Now he is supported by his wife, and she helps him to do a business. Olim is planning to buy horned cattle for further selling. He is asking for financial support from the Kiva project to buy horned cattle. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy horned cattle

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia Cristina se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Cristina continues to make a living with her restaurant business. She is an enterprising woman. She wants to use to her business to help her children complete their studies. Her dream is to have a big restaurant. She is requesting the loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

Cristina is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 56 years old and lives in  Dicayas, Dipolog, in the Philippines. In order to help the family, Merlyn engages in vegetable gardening activities. In 2011, she became an active member of Paglaum MPC with good credit standing. 

To generate another source of income, Merlyn requested financial assistance in the amount of PHP 6,000 to start up a sari-sari (small grocery) store business. The loan is intended to purchase stock for her sari-sari store because the earnings from her vegetable garden are not sufficient for her daily needs. In the future, she plans to repair and expand her house to provide a comfortable living space for all those in the family.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her sari-sari store

location.town: Dipolog - Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Goody

texts.en:
Goody is 40 years old and lives in Northern Poblacion, Calamba. He is married and has two children. 

Goody has a stall of clothes as a business and earns approximately 15,000 PHP each month doing this work. 

He has requested a loan to buy stock for resale. Goody has been a member of PMPC for the last year. 

In the future, Goody hopes to have his own boutique.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of clothes to resell

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
In 2011, Felisa learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it extends. Felisa tried her luck on doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owe her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

Felisa has borrowed another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will give her gardening income a big boost. Felisa looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and compost

loans.name: Norlita

texts.en:
Norlita is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Norlita is 42 years old and her child is in school.

Norlita has a business buying and selling ready-to-wear in the Philippines. 

Norlita requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy clothes like shirts, etc. to sell.

Norlita has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, Norlita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes like shirts, etc. to sell

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Elena is 53 years old now.

Elena has a buy-and-sell coco lumber business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of coco lumber to sell.

Elena has been in this business for two years. In the future, Elena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of coco lumber to sell

loans.name: Ma Angel

texts.es: Doña Ma Angel muy contenta y agradecida por el crédito financiado a través los diferentes inversionistas en Kiva y COMIXMUL ella logro comprar los abonos, foliares y la semilla de maíz y frijol con la cual abono y sembró una manzana de tierra y obtuvo 30 quintales de maíz y 25 quintales de frijoles obteniendo una buena ganancia sobre su cosecha. A ella le gusto trabajar con COMIXMUL por la atención brindada en el campo y en las oficinas por el personal ya que se sintió muy cómoda y agradecida siendo su propósito en esta nueva ocasión la siembra y cultivo de una parcela de tierra que recién compro la cual necesita limpiar, preparar y posteriormente atender con los abonos y demás insumos así como también la compra de más semilla de maíz y frijol para ampliar de esta manera sus cultivos, su propiedad y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Ma Angel is very happy and grateful for the loan provided by the KIva investors and COMIXMUL.  With it she was able to buy fertilizers, seedlings, and corn and bean seeds with which she was able to obtain 30 quintals of corn and 25 quintals of beans, hence receiving a good earning from her harvest.  
She enjoyed working with COMIXMUL for the attention received both in the field and at the offices by the employees which made her feel comfortable and grateful.
In this ocassion, her goal is to clean and prepare a new plot of land which she just bought for planting and harvesting more corn and beans and she will need some other neceary products, including seeds, in order to expand her harvest, her property, and her income.

loans.use: to buy the necessary products to aid in the growth of corn and beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a chaffcutter

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a single woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a food stall business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of stiff competition from other retail operators.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia  Gladis  se sigue dedicando al negocio de panaderia, la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es abrir otro negocio de panaderia.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar harina, azúcar y manteca.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Gladis  continues to work in her bakery. She is a hard-working woman who through this work gets her family ahead. Her dream is to open another bakery business. She is requesting the loan to buy flour, sugar and butter. She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payment of her installments.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and butter.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is from Dipolog, Zamboanga del Norte. She is earning a living through her retailing business, buying and selling various footwear, used clothing, kitchenware and plastic ware. Susan has a good return from this business, enabling her to sufficiently support their needs.

To generate more income, Susan decided to expand her resources after she learned that she can get financial assistance from PMPC. As Susan has saved an amount from her business, she thought of doing farming activities to earn additional income. Consequently, she requested a loan to pay for a parcel of agricultural land to start her farming project.

Susan smiles at the thought of having a comfortable life and providing her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a parcel of agricultural land to start her farming project

location.town: Dipolog - Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is from Cavite, Philippines. She is still single and has been employed at a garment factory in Cavite for years now through the help of the CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative*.

Jocelyn is a clothing presser. She presses fabrics or garments during the production process (known as under-pressing) as well in the final stages of production (usually in a garment-finishing department). Sometimes, she helps in the sewing process and other production processes, if necessary.

One of the main dilemmas of employees like Jocelyn is the improper balancing of their salaries with family expenses, and they have no access to savings or credit, a situation that makes them heavily indebted to usurious money lenders who captured their automated teller machine (ATM) cards as loan collateral. 

For this reason, Jocelyn is asking for your assistance to prevent her from being exposed to loan sharks. She has also previously accessed loans through CCT Credit Cooperative and she had no problem in returning it back since the loan payment is being deducted every payday.  She looks forward to your positive response and any coming amount from you will surely be of great help. She will also use the loan to pay for the education of her siblings who are already studying in secondary school.

Jocelyn wants to operate her own business in the future. She hopes to give her siblings the best education possible. She meets up with her co-fellowship** members to share stories of her work. 

* The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for deployment in construction and site development projects.  The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, quality for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families.  Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services.

** CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for the factory workers before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions and spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre and post working hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: to pay for the educational expenses of her siblings

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Nida finds pleasure in doing her vegetable gardening activities. Not only is she doing it as a hobby, but she earns an income as well. At the age of 43 and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. 

She grabbed the opportunity to become a full fledged member of PMPC. She credits the cooperative for her capital in supporting her gardening activities. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase gardening tools and fertilizer. 

In the future, she wishes to become the supplier of vegetables in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase gardening tools and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw material like soles, glue, leather, amongst others.

loans.name: Jose Guadalupe

texts.es: Jose de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre y su hermano, el se dedica a la agricultura y a l crianza de ganado repasto, el posee 15 años de experiencia y siempre ha trabajado con créditos, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado repasto para poder continuar con la crianza y asi poder generar buenos ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Jose is 31 years old and lives in his own house with his mother and his brother. He works in agriculture and raising cattle. He has 15 years experience and has always used loans. He sells his product in the neighboring communities and with what he makes from his sales he manages to pay some of the household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy cattle to be able to continue to raise them and be able to generate good economic income.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es:
El socio Saturnino se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ferreteria,el sueño del socio es tener otro negocio de ferreteria y por medio de este negocio el socio quiere sacar adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar clavos, pinturas y alambres.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, Saturnino, continues to make his living selling hardware. He dreams of opening another hardware store, which would help him to and his family get ahead in life. 

Saturno is requesting a loan to buy nails, paints and wires. He is happy to have the loan and he promises to make all of the payments.

loans.use: to buy nails, paints and wires.

loans.name: Elmer Omar

texts.es: Elmer de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la comprar y crianza de bueyes para producir servicio de sacado de tierra para cultivar, posee 20 años de experiencia en este trabajo, inicio con una sola yunta de bueyes, y durante todo el años realiza este trabajo ya que la zona donde reside hay una buena actividad agrícola, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una yunta de bueyes y así poder seguir con la crianza y así poder aumentar sus ingresos monetarios y el patrimonio de su negocio.
texts.en:
Elmer is 45 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner. He makes a living buying and raising ox in order to provide a ploughing service. He has 20 years of experience in this line of work, and he started out with just a single pair of ox. He works throughout the year, since in the area where he lives there is a lot of agricultural activity. 

With what he makes from his work, he manages to cover some household expenses. He is asking for a loan in order to buy a pair of ox, so that he can continue raising them and increase his income and the assets of his business.

loans.use: to buy a team of ox.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica al cultivo de café, posee 25 años de experiencia en el cultivo, su esposo también le ayuda en la siembra, vende sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes y productos agroquímicos para obtener mejores cosechas y así mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Consuelo is 64 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She makes a living cultivating coffee, and she has 25 years of experience in this field. Her husband also helps her carry out her work. She sells her products in neighbouring towns, and she has regular customers.

With the profits she makes she is able to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan in order to buy fertiliser and agrochemical products, so that she can have better harvests and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and agrochemical products.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 55 years old and married with five children. With one child in school, Delia works very hard to provide for them.

Delia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store like bread, canned goods, eggs, and other groceries.

Delia has been in this business for 4 years now. 

In the future, Delia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store like bread, canned goods, eggs, and other groceries

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Erlinda is 58 years old. She has been operating a tailoring business in the Philippines for three years. Erlinda requested a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF), to buy fabric and other materials to use in her business. In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other materials to use in her business

loans.name: Confiance Group

texts.fr:
Sané est la dame assise au milieu des deux autres assises, elle devant elle juste des sachets d’eaux devant. 
Sané est une restauratrice  Malienne, âgée de 35 ans elle est mère de 2 enfants âgées de 22 et  20 ans tous scolarisés.
Sané est séparée de son mari  depuis quelque année. Elle abandonne l’école en septième année pour aider sa tante dans la restauration, dès lors elle porte un grand intérêt à cette activité. Elle fait recourt au RMCR pour avoir de l’argent pour  soutenir sa restauration. Le prêt ainsi contracté sera entièrement investi dans l’achat des sachets d’eaux potable, en plus de la nourriture très variées, des boissons, Sané  constate que ses clients réclame très souvent les sachets d’eaux potables  c’ est pourquoi elle décide de lier  un partenariat avec une usine de production d’eaux potables. L’Usine livre à elle par semaine un chargement de camionnette, elle revend en demi-gros et en détail. Elle rêve de construire un entrepôt pour stocké plus d’eaux.  Elles s’approvisionnent à Bamako et revends à  sa commune, elle pourrait génère un intérêt de 50000FCFA par mois. Elle trouve que la commercialisation des sachets d’eaux est rentable et ne se décompose pas ceux qui réduit considérablement les pertes.
texts.en:
Sané is the lady sitting in the middle of the two other seated women. She is holding some bags of water in front of her. 

Sané is a restaurant owner from Mali, aged 35. She is the mother of two children aged 22 and 20, both schooling. 

Sané has been separated from her husband for some years. She left school in the seventh grade to help her aunt with serving cooked food. Ever since then she has had a great interest in this business. 

She came to RMCR to have the money to sustain her restaurant. The loan that she contracted will be completely invested in buying bags of drinkable water, as well as other varied sorts of food and drinks. Sané  has noticed that her clients often ask for these bags of drinkable water. This is why she decided to form a partnership with a factory that produces drinkable water. The factory delivers a pick-up truck load of water to her weekly, and she resells it semi-wholesale and retail. She dreams of building a warehouse to stock more water. 

Sané buys her supplies in Bamako and sells in her community. She can make a profit of 50,000 F CFA per month. She finds that selling bags of water is a lucrative business and it doesn't go bad, which considerably reduces the losses.

loans.use: to buy bags of water and other necessities for running a restaurant

loans.name: Luz Divina Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Luz Divina está en su ciclo número 1º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde al conformar el comité se han comprometido a  trabajar en equipo y  realizar actividades   para llegar a los objetivos en común que tienen dentro del  grupo. 
La Sra. Marta, una de las integrantes, se dedica a la venta de comestibles y bebidas, ella está muy contenta por formar parte del programa de comité, ya que con ello ayuda a su familia. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y luchadora que es conocida en el barrio por las delicias que prepara, pues sus comidas son muy ricas.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas y luego vender, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
The group named “Luz Divina” (Divine Light) is in its first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The members formed this committee and are committed to working as a team and engaging in activities that will help them achieve their common objectives as a group.

Sra. Marta is one of the members who sells food and beverages. She is very content with having joined the committee program since it will enable her to help her family. Marta is an enterprising and determined woman who is known in her neighborhood for the delicious foods that she prepares. Her dishes are quite tasty.

Marta is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for preparing her dishes for sale such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and other items. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received so that she can continue her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other supplies.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), tiene 28 años de experiencia en la agricultura, inicio trabajando con capital propio, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios y pagar el alquiler de parcela donde siembra ya que el no posee terreno propio para cosechar, y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel is 58 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and their three children. He makes a living cultivating basic grains (maize and beans). He has 28 years experience in agriculture. He started working with his own capital, selling his products in the different marketplaces close to his house. 

With what he makes from his sales, he manages to cover some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan in order to buy necessary agricultural supplies and pay the rent on the land he farms, since he doesn't own his own land. In this way he will be able to improve his quality of life, and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy necessary agricultural products and pay the rent on his land.

loans.name: Antero German

texts.es:
El socio Antero German se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta y distribucion de vinos y licores, el socio es una persona trabajadora y por medio de este negocio el socio quiere sacar adelante a su familia, el sueño del socio es tener un local donde pueda vender los vinos. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar vinos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Antero German continues to be dedicated to the business of selling and distributing wines and liquors. He is a hard-working person and by means of this business, he hopes to advance his family. Antero's dream is to have a store where he can sell his wines. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase wines.

Antero is happy about the loan and he promises to comply with his schedule of payments.

loans.use: to purchase wines to sell.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en: Leah is 36 years old and married with two children. Her oldest child is 12, and the youngest is 8. They live in Antequera, Boho, Philippines. For seven years, Leah has been operating a sari-sari (variety) store, selling basic commodities such as sugar, eggs, seasonings, biscuits, cooking oil, soap and beverages. Leah is asking for a loan to buy inventory for her store such as soft drinks, groceries, canned goods and soap. These items will fill her store and attract more buyers. In this way, she can continue to send her children to school and provide them with better living conditions. Leah would like to manage her business successfully to become more productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her store

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 38 years old and is married with five school-age children. The family lives in Dicayas, Dipolog. 

Teresa is earning a profit through her "tuba" (coconut wine) and vegetable vending, and she is also working in swine production to generate additional income. This is how she helps her husband in sustaining their day-to-day survival. 

Teresa joined Paglaum to learn about insurance and financial assistance. She is a hardworking mother who has a strong determination to pursue her goals. 

Someday she hopes to send all her children to college so that they may help her in renovating their house in the future.

loans.use: to buy bags of gestating feed for her swine and to pay for more containers of "tuba" (coconut wine) and vegetables to sell

location.town: Dipolog - Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en: Andrea is from Dipolog. She and her husband earn a living from their rice farm. Andrea requested a loan to purchase a carabao (water buffalo) to plow and harrow their land in hope of increasing their harvest. Andrea deeply wishes to save enough for their needs and future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase a water buffalo to plow and harrow her rice farm

location.town: Dipolog - Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Susette

texts.en:
Susette is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Susette is 37 years old, and has five children who are still in school.

Susette has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Susette has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 51 years old now.

Teresita has a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to puchase sacks of charcoal to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to puchase sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Glendis Elizabeth

texts.es:
Glendis, tiene una linda familia integrada por su compañero de vida y su hijo de tan solo dos años de edad, para ser un apoyo en los gastos de su hogar desde hace dos años inicio a vender ropa para damas, caballeros y niños/as, hasta la fecha cuenta con clientes que son fieles a su negocio por la atención y buenos precios que Glendis les ofrece.
Se decidió por solicitar un crédito para comprar camisas, faldas, pantalones, calcetas, vestidos, etc., su negocio estará surtido con prendas de vestir a la moda, así sus clientes frecuentes encontraran todo lo que buscan a un mejor precio y será de ayuda para atraer nuevos clientes.
Sus aspiraciones son continuar trabajando para tener su fuente de ingresos con vida, reducir sus deudas  y ayudar a su pareja a cubrir las necesidades familiares.
texts.en: Glendis has a beautiful family made up of her life companion and her two year old son. In order to  help with the household expenses she started to sell clothing for women, men and children two years ago.
