Until now she has had clients loyal to her business because of the attention and good prices that Glendis offers them. She decided to request a loan to buy shirts, skirts, pants, socks and dresses, etc. so that her business will be stocked with fashionable clothing. Then her regular clients can find all that they are looking for at a good price. And that will help her to attract new clients. Her wish is to continue working to have a source of income to live, reduce her debt and help her partner cover the necessities for the family.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, pants, socks, dresses, etc. so her business will be stocked with fashionable clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 20 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y gallinas, clienta cuenta con 2 años de dedicarse a la crianza y venta, comercializa sus productos en las zonas aledañas donde ella vive, con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, al joven vive en casa propia con su padres, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos de engorde y así continuar con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The youth who has had her face blurred is 20 years old and lives in a high-risk zone. She works raising chickens and chicks. She has two years experience raising and selling chickens and she sells them in the areas neighboring where she lives. With her sales she manages to get ahead with the household expenses. This youth lives in her own house with her parents. She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens and thereby continue with her work in order to obtain higher income.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Moises Neftali

texts.es: Marcos de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la crianza de cerdos de granja, tiene 20 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, vende a los cerdos a los compradores de la zona donde el reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado, vacunas, suero para los cerdos y mejorar el lugar donde los mantiene para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Marcos is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He works raising pigs. He has been doing this business for 20 years. He sells the pigs to buyers in the area where he lives and with what he makes from his sales he manages to pay some of the household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed, vaccines and serum for the pigs and improve the space where he keeps them. Then he can continue with his work and have higher income.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed, vaccines, serum and improve their space.

loans.name: Nim

texts.en:
Nim is a 32-year-old married factory worker with two young children in her care. She has worked in the factory since 2007. Her husband is a 32-year-old construction foreman. All of them live in Kampong Chhnang province of Cambodia. Both Nim and her husband can earn around USD 13 each day. 

She lacks the finances to buy a motorcycle for commuting to work and family use, therefore she is requesting a loan. 

With the motorcycle from the loan, her family will be able to have better traveling conditions and reduce traveling expenses. 

For her future plans, Nim is going to save money to build a new proper house and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for commuting to work and family use

loans.name: Sherelyn

texts.en:
Sherelyn and her husband eagerly manage their street food vending business in their town. They have their stall in front of their market. Sherelyn sells lumpia, meat balls, and banana que. 

Sherilyn is very thankful to have the business because out from their income, they are able to invest in another source of income. Sherelyn wants to sell cold juice, halo-halo, and other foods that peak in the summer season. 

Therefore, she is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy ingredients and other materials for her business. 

She and her husband hope to grow the business to be able to sustain their three children's needs in school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El socio Julio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte y tambien negocio de panaderia, el socio por medio de sus dos trabajos saca adelante a su familia y quiere comprarse un carro nuevo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas y parabrisas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Julio continues to work in his transportation business and also in his bakery business. Through his two businesses he gets his family ahead and he wants to buy a new car. He is requesting a loan to buy tires and a windshield for his car. He is happy with the loan and promises to comply with the payment of his installments.

loans.use: to buy tires and a windshield for his car.

loans.name: Alyn

texts.en:
Alyn is responsible and dedicated in her work as a tailor. This is her only source of income, and she is very grateful for her life and being allowed to be independent. She has a business producing school uniforms and repairing clothes. This business has given her the opportunity to work and survive.

She applied for a loan in order to expand her business and increase production. She will buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies. 

This will allow her generate more income and be able to cater tailoring services.

loans.use: to buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies
